audit_log_rls.name: audit_log_rls
audit_log_rls.using:
current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) = 'SUPER_ADMIN'
        OR tenant_id::text = current_setting('app.current_tenant', TRUE)

user_consents_rls.name: user_consents_rls
user_consents_rls.using:
user_id::text = current_setting('app.current_user_id', TRUE)
        OR current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) IN ('SUPER_ADMIN', 'ORG_ADMIN')

retention_policies_rls.name: retention_policies_rls
retention_policies_rls.using:
tenant_id IS NULL
        OR tenant_id::text = current_setting('app.current_tenant', TRUE)
        OR current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) = 'SUPER_ADMIN'

competency_goals_rls.name: competency_goals_rls
competency_goals_rls.using:
user_id::text = current_setting('app.current_user_id', TRUE)
        OR current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) IN ('SUPER_ADMIN', 'ORG_ADMIN', 'INSTRUCTOR')

srs_cards_rls.name: srs_cards_rls
srs_cards_rls.using:
user_id::text = current_setting('app.current_user_id', TRUE)
        OR current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) IN ('SUPER_ADMIN', 'ORG_ADMIN', 'INSTRUCTOR')

point_events_rls.name: point_events_rls
point_events_rls.using:
user_id::text = current_setting('app.current_user_id', TRUE)
        OR current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) IN ('SUPER_ADMIN', 'ORG_ADMIN')

user_badges_rls.name: user_badges_rls
user_badges_rls.using:
user_id::text = current_setting('app.current_user_id', TRUE)
        OR current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) IN ('SUPER_ADMIN', 'ORG_ADMIN', 'INSTRUCTOR')

skill_profiles_tenant_isolation.name: skill_profiles_tenant_isolation
skill_profiles_tenant_isolation.withCheck:
tenant_id::text = current_setting('app.current_tenant', TRUE)
        AND (
          current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) IN ('SUPER_ADMIN', 'ORG_ADMIN', 'INSTRUCTOR')
        )

text_submissions_rls.name: text_submissions_rls
text_submissions_rls.using:
(user_id::text = current_setting('app.current_user_id', TRUE)
          AND tenant_id::text = current_setting('app.current_tenant', TRUE))
        OR current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) IN ('SUPER_ADMIN', 'ORG_ADMIN', 'INSTRUCTOR')
text_submissions_rls.withCheck:
user_id::text = current_setting('app.current_user_id', TRUE)
        AND tenant_id::text = current_setting('app.current_tenant', TRUE)

user_follows_rls.name: user_follows_rls
user_follows_rls.using:
tenant_id::text = current_setting('app.current_tenant', TRUE)
        AND (
          follower_id::text = current_setting('app.current_user_id', TRUE)
          OR following_id::text = current_setting('app.current_user_id', TRUE)
          OR current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) IN ('SUPER_ADMIN', 'ORG_ADMIN')
        )

assessment_campaigns_rls.name: assessment_campaigns_rls
assessment_campaigns_rls.using:
tenant_id = current_setting('app.current_tenant', TRUE)::uuid
        AND (
          target_user_id = current_setting('app.current_user_id', TRUE)::uuid
          OR current_setting('app.current_role', TRUE) IN ('ORG_ADMIN', 'SUPER_ADMIN', 'INSTRUCTOR')
        )

assessment_responses_rls.name: assessment_responses_rls
assessment_responses_rls.using:
tenant_id = current_setting('app.current_tenant', TRUE)::uuid
        AND (
          responder_id = current_setting('app.current_user_id', TRUE)::uuid
          OR current_setting('app.current_role', TRUE) IN ('ORG_ADMIN', 'SUPER_ADMIN', 'INSTRUCTOR')
        )

open_badge_assertions_rls.name: open_badge_assertions_rls
open_badge_assertions_rls.using:
tenant_id::text = current_setting('app.current_tenant', TRUE)
        AND (
          recipient_id::text = current_setting('app.current_user_id', TRUE)
          OR current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) IN ('SUPER_ADMIN', 'ORG_ADMIN', 'INSTRUCTOR')
        )

open_badge_definitions_rls.name: open_badge_definitions_rls
open_badge_definitions_rls.using:
tenant_id::text = current_setting('app.current_tenant', TRUE)
        AND (
          current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) IN ('SUPER_ADMIN', 'ORG_ADMIN', 'INSTRUCTOR')
          OR current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) = 'STUDENT'
        )

instructor_payouts_rls.name: instructor_payouts_rls
instructor_payouts_rls.using:
instructor_id::text = current_setting('app.current_user_id', TRUE)
        OR current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) IN ('SUPER_ADMIN', 'ORG_ADMIN')

purchases_rls.name: purchases_rls
purchases_rls.using:
user_id::text = current_setting('app.current_user_id', TRUE)
        OR current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) IN ('SUPER_ADMIN', 'ORG_ADMIN', 'INSTRUCTOR')

stripe_customers_rls.name: stripe_customers_rls
stripe_customers_rls.using:
user_id::text = current_setting('app.current_user_id', TRUE)
        OR current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) IN ('SUPER_ADMIN', 'ORG_ADMIN')

portal_pages_admin_rls.name: portal_pages_admin_rls
portal_pages_admin_rls.using:
tenant_id::text = current_setting('app.current_tenant', TRUE)
        AND current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) IN ('SUPER_ADMIN', 'ORG_ADMIN')
portal_pages_admin_rls.withCheck:
tenant_id::text = current_setting('app.current_tenant', TRUE)
        AND current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) IN ('SUPER_ADMIN', 'ORG_ADMIN')

portal_pages_read_published_rls.name: portal_pages_read_published_rls
portal_pages_read_published_rls.using:
tenant_id::text = current_setting('app.current_tenant', TRUE)
        AND published = TRUE

announcements_rls.name: announcements_rls
announcements_rls.withCheck:
tenant_id::text = current_setting('app.current_tenant', TRUE)
        AND current_setting('app.current_user_role', TRUE) IN ('SUPER_ADMIN', 'ORG_ADMIN')
